note: Urban Planner (pianificazione urbana), affordable housing advocate, musician & tinkerer. Husband and father of two kids under five. US-IT citizen living in the American Northwest.  Genuine interest in, and commitment to, improving the lives of others. Interests include urban design, landscape architecture, street photography, maps, geography, data, hiking, trying to learn Italian, travel, DIY, music, genealogy. “Everything was beautiful, and nothing hurt” Views expressed are mine alone.
